overview: A woman who believes in Communist Ideology falls in love with the Son of a Wealthy businessman. On a Road Trip, They came to know the difference between their Lifestyle and Mindset. They break up but soon Their Heartbreaking love story took a big turn.
tagline: What happens when a woman who believes in Communist Ideology to the core fall in love with a Rich Guy who believes in Capitalism...
title: Communist Girlfriend Capitalist Boyfriend
